org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.player

Interface PlayerInteractEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cancellable, EntityEvent, EntityInteractEvent, Event, GameEvent, HumanEvent, HumanInteractEvent, LivingEvent, LivingInteractEvent, PlayerEvent, UserEvent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PlayerInteractBlockEvent, PlayerInteractEntityEvent

    public interface PlayerInteractEvent
extends PlayerEvent, HumanInteractEvent
    Called when a Player interacts with the world.

    • Method Detail

      • getInteractionType

        EntityInteractionType getInteractionType()
        Gets the EntityInteractionType that the player used.
        Returns:
        The type of click

      • getClickedPosition

        Optional<com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3d> getClickedPosition()
        Gets the clicked position of this interact event.

        This may not always be available, in which case Optional.absent() is returned. Specifically, when a player is interacting with an entity that requires a position, the position is given. IF a player interacts with a block, a position may be given depending on the circumstance of the block process.

        Returns:
        The position, if available
